DOC.brief_title: Minimally Invasive Interval Debulking Surgery Ovarian Neoplasm : Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: The aim prospective Phase II multicentric study assess feasibility early complication rate `` total laparoscopic/robotic '' interval debulking surgery patient clinical complete/partial response neoadjuvant chemotherapy advance ovarian cancer .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year , Advanced ovarian cancer submit neoadjuvant chemotherapy , Clinical serological complete/partial response ( RECIST ; GCIG ) , PS â‰¤ 2 ( ECOG ) , Informed consent Borderline nonepithelial ovarian tumor , Stable/progressive disease , ASA 34 , Severe cardiopulmonary disease , BMI > 40
